message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Can we meet in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $10,000 is a tempting offer, the value of this product is significantly higher.  Would you consider $12,500?
I understand the value of the product, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'd be willing to go up to $11,500, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me there?
